parameters.name: Arn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the configuration.

parameters.name: ServerProperties
parameters.description: Contents of the server.properties file. When using the API, you must ensure that the contents of the file are base64 encoded. When using the AWS Management Console, the SDK, or the AWS CLI, the contents of server.properties can be in plaintext.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the configuration.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time when the configuration revision was created.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the configuration revision.
